masterGrammar.rule: rule {CP option 1 - no fronting, root} CP = C' <CP head> = <C' head> <C' head type root > = + <C' head type vacuous> = - <C' head type relative> = - <C' head fronted> = none

rule {CP option 2a - DP specifier initial, wh, root} CP = DP C' <CP head> = <C' head> <C' head type root> = + <C' head type question> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C' head fronted> = <DP> <DP head type wh> = + <DP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <DP head type prefix poss> = - <DP head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <DP head type suffix copular> = - <CP option> = 2a

rule {CP option 2b - PP specifier initial, wh, root} CP = PP C' <CP head> = <C' head> <C' head type root> = + <C' head type question> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C' head fronted> = <PP> <PP head type wh> = + <PP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <PP head type prefix poss> = - <CP option> = 2b

rule {CP option 2c - AdvP specifier initial, wh, root} CP = AdvP C' <CP head> = <C' head> <C' head type root> = + <C' head type question> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C' head fronted> = <AdvP> <AdvP head type wh> = + <CP option> = 2c

rule {CP option 2d - C, DP specifier initial, wh, root} CP = C DP C' <CP head> = <C' head> <C' head type root> = + <C' head type question> = + <C head type question> = + <C head type wh> = + <C head type CP-specifier-initial> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C' head fronted> = <DP> <DP head type wh> = + <DP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <DP head type prefix poss> = - <DP head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <DP head type suffix copular> = - <CP option> = 2d

rule {CP option 2e - C, PP specifier initial, wh, root} CP = C PP C' <CP head> = <C' head> <C' head type root> = + <C' head type question> = + <C head type question> = + <C head type wh> = + <C head type CP-specifier-initial> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C' head fronted> = <PP> <PP head type wh> = + <PP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <PP head type prefix poss> = - <CP option> = 2e

rule {CP option 2f - C, AdvP specifier initial, wh, root} CP = C AdvP C' <CP head> = <C' head> <C' head type root> = + <C' head type question> = + <C head type question> = + <C head type wh> = + <C head type CP-specifier-initial> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C' head fronted> = <AdvP> <AdvP head type wh> = + <CP option> = 2f
rule {CP option 3 - no fronting, non-root} CP = C' <CP head> = <C' head> <C' head type root > = - <C' head type vacuous> = - | to avoid empty CP <C' head fronted> = none <CP option> = 3

rule {CP option 4a - DP specifier initial, wh, non-root} CP = DP C' <CP head> = <C' head> <C' head type root> = - <C' head type question> = + <C' head type wh> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C' head fronted> = <DP> <DP head type wh> = + <DP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <DP head type prefix poss> = - <DP head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <DP head type suffix copular> = - <CP option> = 4a

rule {CP option 4arel - DP specifier initial, wh, relative clause} CP = DP C' <CP head> = <C' head> <C' head type root> = - <C' head type relative> = + <C' head type wh> = + <C' head fronted> = <DP> <DP head type wh> = + <DP head type relative> = + <DP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <DP head type prefix poss> = - <DP head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <DP head type suffix copular> = - <CP option> = 4arel

rule {CP option 4b - PP specifier initial, wh, non-root} CP = PP C' <CP head> = <C' head> <C' head type root> = - <C' head type question> = + <C' head fronted> = <PP> <C' head type relative> = - <PP head type wh> = + <PP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <PP head type prefix poss> = - <CP option> = 4b

rule {CP option 4c - AdvP specifier initial, wh, non-root} CP = AdvP C' <CP head> = <C' head> <C' head type root> = - <C' head type question> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C' head fronted> = <AdvP> <AdvP head type wh> = + <CP option> = 4c

rule {CP option 4d - C, DP specifier initial, wh, non-root} CP = C DP C' <CP head> = <C' head> <C' head type root> = - <C' head type question> = + <C head type question> = + <C head type wh> = + <C head type CP-specifier-initial> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C' head fronted> = <DP> <DP head type wh> = + <DP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <DP head type prefix poss> = - <DP head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <DP head type suffix copular> = - <CP option> = 4d

rule {CP option 4e - C, PP specifier initial, wh, non-root} CP = C PP C' <CP head> = <C' head> <C' head type root> = - <C' head type question> = + <C head type question> = + <C head type wh> = + <C head type CP-specifier-initial> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C' head fronted> = <PP> <PP head type wh> = + <PP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <PP head type prefix poss> = - <CP option> = 4e

rule {CP option 4f - C, AdvP specifier initial, wh, non-root} CP = C AdvP C' <CP head> = <C' head> <C' head type root> = - <C' head type question> = + <C head type question> = + <C head type wh> = + <C head type CP-specifier-initial> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C' head fronted> = <AdvP> <AdvP head type wh> = + <CP option> = 4f

rule {CBar option 1a - head vacuous, root, no aux fronting} C' = IP <C' head> = <IP head> <C' head type root> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C' head type vacuous> = + | to avoid empty CP <C' option> = 1a

rule {CBar option 1b - head vacuous, root, with possible aux fronting} C' = IP <C' head> = <IP head> <C' head type root> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C' head type vacuous> = + | to avoid empty CP <IP head type auxiliary> = - | if aux present, must front <C' option> = 1b

rule {CBar option 1c - head-initial, question, root} C' = C IP <C' head> = <IP head> <C' head type> = <C head type> <C' head type root> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C' head type question> = + <C head type CP-initial> = + <C' option> = 1c
rule {CBar option 1d - Aux initial, question, root} C' = Aux IP <C' head> = <IP head> <C' head type root> = + <C' head type question> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C' option> = 1d

rule {CBar option 1e - head-final, question, root} C' = IP C <C' head> = <IP head> <C' head type> = <C head type> <C' head type root> = + <C' head type question> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C head type CP-final> = + <C' option> = 1e
rule {CBar option 1f - Aux final, question, root} C' = IP Aux <C' head> = <IP head> <C' head type root> = + <C' head type question> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C' option> = 1f

rule {CBar option 1g - head both sides, question, root} C' = C IP C_1 <C' head> = <IP head> <C' head type> = <C head type> <C head type question> = <C_1 head type question> <C' head type root> = + <C' head type question> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C head type CP-initial> = + <C_1 head type CP-final> = + <C' option> = 1g
rule {CBar option 2a - head vacuous, non-root, no aux fronting} C' = IP <C' head> = <IP head> <C' head type root> = - <C' head type vacuous> = + | to avoid empty CP <C' option> = 2a

rule {CBar option 2b - head vacuous, non-root, with possible aux fronting} C' = IP <C' head> = <IP head> <C' head type root> = - <C' head type relative> = - <C' head type vacuous> = + | to avoid empty CP <IP head type auxiliary> = - | if aux present, must front <C' option> = 2b

rule {CBar option 2c - head-initial, question, non-root} C' = C IP <C' head> = <IP head> <C' head type> = <C head type> <C' head type root> = - <C' head type question> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C head type CP-initial> = + <C' option> = 2c
rule {CBar option 2d - Aux initial, question, non-root} C' = Aux IP <C' head> = <IP head> <C' head type root> = - <C' head type question> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C' option> = 2d

rule {CBar option 2e - head-final, question, non-root} C' = IP C <C' head> = <IP head> <C' head type> = <C head type> <C' head type root> = - <C' head type question> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C head type CP-final> = + <C' option> = 2e
rule {CBar option 2f - Aux final, question, non-root} C' = IP Aux <C' head> = <IP head> <C' head type root> = - <C' head type question> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C' option> = 2f

rule {CBar option 2g - head both sides, question, non-root} C' = C IP C_1 <C' head> = <IP head> <C' head type> = <C head type> <C head type question> = <C_1 head type question> <C' head type root> = - <C' head type question> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C head type CP-initial> = + <C_1 head type CP-final> = + <C' option> = 2g

rule {CBar option 2j - head-initial, non-question, non-root} C' = C IP <C' head> = <IP head> <C' head type> = <C head type> <C' head type root> = - <C' head type question> = - <C' head type relative> = - <C head type CP-initial> = + <C' option> = 2j

rule {CBar option 2k - head-final, non-question, non-root} C' = IP C <C' head> = <IP head> <C' head type> = <C head type> <C' head type root> = - <C' head type question> = - <C' head type relative> = - <C head type CP-final> = + <C' option> = 2k

rule {CBar option 2l - head both sides, non-question, non-root} C' = C IP C_1 <C' head> = <IP head> <C' head type> = <C head type> <C head type question> = <C_1 head type question> <C head type relative> = <C_1 head type relative> <C' head type root> = - <C' head type question> = - <C' head type relative> = - <C head type CP-initial> = + <C_1 head type CP-final> = + <C' option> = 2l

rule {C' option 3a - YNQ_prefix, IP complement, root} C' = IP <C' head> = <IP head> {<IP head type prefix YNQ> = + /<IP head type YNQ> = + } <C' head type question> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C' head type root> = +

rule {CBar option 3b - YNQ_suffix, IP complement, root} C' = IP <C' head> = <IP head> {<IP head type suffix YNQ> = + /<IP head type YNQ> = + } <C' head type question> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C' head type root> = + <CBar option> = 3b

rule {CBar option 3c - YNQ_prefix, IP complement, non-root} C' = IP <C' head> = <IP head> {<IP head type prefix YNQ> = + /<IP head type YNQ> = + } <C' head type question> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C' head type root> = - <CBar option> = 3c

rule {CBar option 3d - YNQ_suffix, IP complement, non-root} C' = IP <C' head> = <IP head> {<IP head type suffix YNQ> = + /<IP head type YNQ> = + } <C' head type question> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C' head type root> = + <CBar option> = 3d

rule {CBar option 4a - whQ_prefix, IP complement, root} C' = IP <C' head> = <IP head> {<IP head type prefix whQ> = + /<IP head type whQ> = + } <C' head type question> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C' head type root> = + <CBar option> = 4a

rule {CBar option 4b - whQ_suffix, IP complement, root} C' = IP <C' head> = <IP head> {<IP head type suffix whQ> = + /<IP head type whQ> = + } <C' head type question> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C' head type root> = + <CBar option> = 4b

rule {CBar option 4c - whQ_prefix, IP complement, non-root} C' = IP <C' head> = <IP head> {<IP head type prefix whQ> = + /<IP head type whQ> = + } <C' head type question> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C' head type root> = - <CBar option> = 4c

rule {CBar option 4d - whQ_suffix, IP complement, non-root} C' = IP <C' head> = <IP head> {<IP head type suffix whQ> = + /<IP head type whQ> = + } <C' head type question> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C' head type root> = + <CBar option> = 4d

rule {CBar option 4e - comp_prefix, IP complement, non-root} C' = IP <C' head> = <IP head> {<IP head type prefix comp> = + /<IP head type comp> = + } <C' head type question> = - <C' head type relative> = - <C' head type root> = - <CBar option> = 4e

rule {CBar option 4f - comp_suffix, IP complement, non-root} C' = IP <C' head> = <IP head> {<IP head type suffix comp> = + /<IP head type comp> = + } <C' head type question> = - <C' head type relative> = - <C' head type root> = + <CBar option> = 4f

rule {CBar option 5a - head-initial, relative clause} C' = C IP <C' head> = <IP head> <C' head type> = <C head type> <C' head type root> = - <C' head type question> = - <C' head type relative> = + <C head type CP-initial> = + <C' option> = 5a

rule {CBar option 5b - head-final, relative clause} C' = IP C <C' head> = <IP head> <C' head type> = <C head type> <C' head type root> = - <C' head type question> = - <C' head type relative> = + <C head type CP-final> = + <C' option> = 5b

rule {CBar option 5c - head both sides, relative clause} C' = C IP C_1 <C' head> = <IP head> <C' head type> = <C head type> <C head type question> = <C_1 head type question> <C head type relative> = <C_1 head type relative> <C' head type root> = - <C' head type question> = - <C' head type relative> = + <C head type CP-initial> = + <C_1 head type CP-final> = + <C' option> = 5c

rule {CBar option 5d - relative_prefix, IP complement} C' = IP <C' head> = <IP head> <IP head type prefix relative> = + <C' head type question> = - <C' head type relative> = + <C' head type root> = - <CBar option> = 5d

rule {CBar option 5e - relative_suffix, IP complement C' = IP <C' head> = <IP head> <IP head type suffix relative> = + <C' head type question> = - <C' head type relative> = + <C' head type root> = + <CBar option> = 5e
